instructions:
Thaw shrimp and peas under cold water. Clean shrimp as necessary. Dry shrimp and peas with paper
towel. Combine lemon juice, Miracle Whip, French dressing, salt and pepper. Pour over remaining
ingredients and toss lightly. Serve on lettuce leaves with crusty French bread. Serves 2.
ingredients: 2 eggs, hard cooked, sliced and halved
name: Shrimp Salad
creator: Mary Decker
